faq.label: Platform FAQ
faq.title: Questions Answered Clearly
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about CyberLabs

items.question: Do I need prior experience to start?
items.answer: No experience is required. CyberLabs is designed for all levels — our learning paths start from absolute beginner and guide you step-by-step up to advanced penetration testing and threat analysis.

items.question: What certifications can I prepare for?
items.answer: Our platform covers prep material for industry-recognized certifications including CompTIA Security+, CEH, CySA+, eJPT, and OSCP — with dedicated labs and mock exams for each.

items.question: Are the labs real environments or simulations?
items.answer: All labs run in isolated, real-world environments hosted in the cloud. You practice on actual vulnerable machines and networks — not simulations — so your skills transfer directly to the job.

items.question: How is my progress tracked?
items.answer: Your dashboard shows completed labs, skill scores, time spent, and certification readiness. You earn badges and points as you progress, making it easy to see exactly where you stand.

items.question: Is the platform legal and safe to use?
items.answer: Absolutely. All hacking activities on CyberLabs are performed within our sandboxed, fully isolated lab environments. Nothing connects to live systems — your learning is 100% legal and safe.
